January 10,1958
Dr# Sam Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
All four NAEB Research Committee Files have now been shipped to you#
In clearing rry desk this afternoon, I came upon this attached sheet
from the Study Group on Utilization. You might wish to check back in the
December letters in the 1957 file and see if there has been any comment
made to Jfarry on this#—*-Seegis to me I may have talked to him on the phone
in just general terms.
However, you may want to take your own action on this.
Cordially,
Raymond D. Cheydleur
Assistant Director
